author: Joshua Caplan
title: Maxine Waters: Trump’s an ‘Incompetent Idiot,’ Must ‘Pray for Forgiveness’
description: Rep. Maxine Waters (D-CA) on Monday went on a social media tirade against President Donald Trump over his administration's response to the spread of the Chinese coronavirus in the United States, describing him as an "incompetent idiot" and demanded that he pr…
